title: 100% bug splat rate (Mac client bug?)
body: Hey guys. Ever since the 7.5 patch, two of my friends and I have not been able to load into any games at all. Whether it be a real game, or simply a practice tool game. Coincidentally, all 3 of us have macs. Is anyone out here having the same trouble with mac clients?

replies.body: I'm having the EXACT SAME problem, haven't been able to play at all!! It bug splats right after champ select!
I'm having this problem too, along with my friend who also has a mac. Have not been able to get into a single game since the patch.
Same, I have run the hextech repair tool, and followed the mac bug guide.....

If all three of you are seeing the Bug Splat window (which has Ziggs at the top and the option to send a report), it could be caused by a number of different software issues. I'd suggest checking out our [Bug Splat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#section-mac) to see if those steps can get to the root of the problem.

When your game won't load, but you don't see the Bug Splat screen, the underlying issue could be an unstable connection between your network and our game servers. If this sounds more like your situation, follow our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac) to see if you can get a more stable connection.

Let me know which sounds more like your issue, and if you have any other questions.
